companyName: The Reich Law Firm - Fresno, CA
description:
Aggressive, experienced and compassionate, our team at The Reich Law Firm handles personal injury, bankruptcy, civil litigation, estate planning and business planning services. From our Fresno, California, location, we serve clients throughout the region, the Bay area and Los Angeles. We have earned a reputation for truly caring about the people we represent because we offer:
  • Personalized representation
  • Customized solutions
  • Accessible legal professionals

We bring decades of experience to your case. The attorneys at our law firm have appeared in both state and federal courts on behalf of clients and are well equipped to pursue litigation when necessary to protect your rights. Thousands of individuals and businesses have benefitted from our knowledge and skills. Additionally, we have returned millions of dollars to people who have suffered wrongdoing, such as through personal injury claims.

Every case at The Reich Law Firm starts with a free initial consultation. Our goal is to understand you and your needs for your case, while at the same time painting a picture of how we can help you. Once we begin working together, we will remain in constant communication with you so that you understand how your case is unfolding. Our attorneys offer virtual appointments to accommodate clients. We also accept credit cards.

The Reich Law Firm is a debt relief agency. We help people file for bankruptcy relief under the Bankruptcy Code.
